TITLE: ZEPETO World function black screen glitch
REVIEW:
Hello, I love this app but I have to take off two stars. I extremely hope a developer sees this because I really want this to be fixed! I have downloaded ZEPETO on my iPad and iPhone. I find the game extremely fun, love the character customization (which is almost limitless with the face which I love) and it is all around a fun game. However, when I use the world function to play worlds using my iPad, depending which way I move my camera angle around, my screen turns black and I can only see specific light sources in the map. This is a HUGE issue! For example, I was trying to play Jump Master and moving my screen a certain way to get a better view of the parkour course turned my screen black. This made it pretty much impossible to enjoy/ play the game. Another thing regarding this issue is certain worlds, no matter how I turned my camera angle, are just a black screen where I can only see certain light sources in the map and people‚Äôs name on the app. I found this to get progressively worse depending on how long you have the app opened and how many worlds you went to. The longer you had the app on and the more worlds you visited, the worse the glitch. I have tried deleting the app and reinstalling it multiple times, but I still face this glitch! And, this only happens on my iPad. This is not an issue when I play on my phone. So, it is just an issue on tablets I am assuming, so please look into this. I love this app and the world function is one of my favorite parts and this glitch is so annoying. While I am writing this review, I might as well mention another bug. Sometimes when I try to make a photo booth post, I will tap the arrow to post it and it will complete whatever it does to post with that purple ring (if you play ZEPETO you know what I am talking about) but then, I new gray ring would pop up spinning endlessly. Like it was loading forever. I apologize for the long review, and I understand if there is nothing you can do, but I would REALLY appreciate if you look into the black screen world glitch. If you find a way to fix that I would be so happy because I would play ZEPETO way more often. Oh, and one more thing! Most of the time when I try to join jump master on my iPad, it crashes the game whenever I am almost loaded in. But, sometimes it doesn‚Äôt. Anyways, please look into that glitch I face with the black screen in the world. I really hope a real person sees this and not a bot so I could actually get some helpful information! Once again, I apologize for the super long review, but thank you so much for reading this! 

(I also wrote this to try and let people know that if they are facing the same issue as me it isn‚Äôt only them because I haven‚Äôt seen anyone else talk about it and it confuses me)
